root.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW V_MAT_STOCK_IMME AS SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, store_id, inv_id, price, batch_sn, batch_no, bar_code, location_id, SUM(amount) as amount FROM ( --出库未确认单据 SELECT mom.group_id, mom.hos_id, mom.copy_code, mom.store_id, matod.inv_id, matod.price, matod.batch_sn, matod.batch_no, matod.bar_code, matod.location_id, SUM(NVL(matod.amount, 0)) as amount FROM mat_out_main mom LEFT JOIN mat_out_detail matod ON mom.group_id = matod.group_id AND mom.hos_id = matod.hos_id AND mom.copy_code = matod.copy_code AND mom.out_id = matod.out_id WHERE mom.state < 3 AND mom.bus_type_code <> '21' GROUP BY mom.group_id, mom.hos_id, mom.copy_code, mom.store_id, matod.inv_id, matod.price, matod.batch_sn, matod.batch_no, matod.bar_code, matod.location_id --退货未确认单据 UNION ALL SELECT mim.group_id, mim.hos_id, mim.copy_code, mim.store_id, matid.inv_id, matid.price, matid.batch_sn, matid.batch_no, matid.bar_code, matid.location_id, -1 * SUM(NVL(matid.amount, 0)) as amount FROM mat_in_main mim LEFT JOIN mat_in_detail matid ON mim.group_id = matid.group_id AND mim.hos_id = matid.hos_id AND mim.copy_code = matid.copy_code AND mim.in_id = matid.in_id WHERE mim.state < 3 AND mim.bus_type_code in (10,12,16,22) GROUP BY mim.group_id, mim.hos_id, mim.copy_code, mim.store_id, matid.inv_id, matid.price, matid.batch_sn, matid.batch_no, matid.bar_code, matid.location_id ) GROUP BY group_id, hos_id, copy_code, store_id, inv_id, price, batch_sn, batch_no, bar_code, location_id

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW V_MAT_STOCK_INV_IMME AS SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, store_id, inv_id, SUM(amount) as amount FROM ( --出库未确认单据 SELECT mom.group_id, mom.hos_id, mom.copy_code, mom.store_id, matod.inv_id, SUM(NVL(matod.amount, 0)) as amount FROM mat_out_main mom LEFT JOIN mat_out_detail matod ON mom.group_id = matod.group_id AND mom.hos_id = matod.hos_id AND mom.copy_code = matod.copy_code AND mom.out_id = matod.out_id WHERE mom.state < 3 AND mom.bus_type_code <> '21' GROUP BY mom.group_id, mom.hos_id, mom.copy_code, mom.store_id, matod.inv_id --退货未确认单据 UNION ALL SELECT mim.group_id, mim.hos_id, mim.copy_code, mim.store_id, matid.inv_id, -1 * SUM(NVL(matid.amount, 0)) as amount FROM mat_in_main mim LEFT JOIN mat_in_detail matid ON mim.group_id = matid.group_id AND mim.hos_id = matid.hos_id AND mim.copy_code = matid.copy_code AND mim.in_id = matid.in_id WHERE mim.state < 3 AND mim.bus_type_code in (10,12,16,22) GROUP BY mim.group_id, mim.hos_id, mim.copy_code, mim.store_id, matid.inv_id ) GROUP BY group_id, hos_id, copy_code, store_id, inv_id
